snippet: All presidential candidates must fill out a form declaring their finances. The form asks how many assets and income sources the candidate has within certain ranges. Here are the ranges of each candidate’s declared assets and income compared with a...
lead_paragraph: All presidential candidates must fill out a form declaring their finances. The form asks how many assets and income sources the candidate has within certain ranges. Here are the ranges of each candidate’s declared assets and income compared with a threshold that represents whether they are within the top 1 percent of earners.

headline.main: Are the Candidates in the Top 1 Percent?
headline.seo: Are the Candidates in the Top 1 Percent?
